Name: Area Effect: Blindness
Description: Accuracy of all party members is reduced.

Name: Area Effect: HP Penalty
Description: Maximum HP of all party members is reduced.

Name: Area Effect: Damage Penalty
Description: Damage dealt by all party members is reduced.

Name: Area Effect: Inability
Description: Use of abilities is prohibited for all party members.

Name: Area Effect: Haste
Description: Weaponskill recast time, spell recast time, and auto-attack delay for all party members are reduced.

Name: Area Effect: HP/MP Boost
Description: Maximum HP and MP of all party members are increased.

Name: Area Effect: Item Penalty
Description: Use of items (including dungeon-specific items) is prohibited for all party members.

Name: Area Effect: Sprint Penalty
Description: Use of the action Sprint is prohibited for all party members.

Name: Area Effect: Knockback Penalty
Description: Knockback and draw-in effects for both enemies and allies are disabled.

Name: Area Effect: Auto-heal Penalty
Description: HP regeneration for all party members is disabled.

Name: Area Effect: Gloom
Description: Enemy movement speed is increased. Enemies also deal more damage while taking less.

Name: Area Effect: Sprint
Description: Movement speed of all party members is increased.

Name: Area Effect: Magicite Penalty
Description: Use of magicite is prohibited for all party members.

Name: Area Effect: Demiclone Penalty
Description: Use of demiclones is prohibited for all party members.

Name: Area Effect: Incense Penalty
Description: Use of incense is prohibited for all party members.
